name: Dead Zombie Killing Road
description:
Got tired of boring zombie shooting games?
Dead Zombie Killing Road will bring you a completely different zombie game experience!
Zombies are everywhere on the road to the safety zombie.
You can only drive a car to reach there.
Arm your car, modify the performance and strive a way to survival.

Features:
*Diversified vehicles & parts
There’re as many as 9 vehicles with delicate 3D graphics for you to select. Players can upgrade the parts of vehicles: tank, wheel, machine gun, nitro launcher, front pushrod, etc. Just modify your car and make it more powerful!
*More game modes
Desert, city, snow-land, forest… you can play the game in different scenes. And there’re multi game modes for you to choose- random mode, level mode, Halloween event mode, etc. Be careful of obstacles and traps like abandoned cars, oil tanks, bomb zombies, landmines…
*Huge rewards
Use the multi game packages to survive longer in the zombie siege.
*Simple to operate
Tap the accelerator to speed up moving, tap the nitro button to use nitro speedup. Tap the shooting button to shoot with machine gun. Just get to the end point in time. Don’t hesitate any more, just join in the amazing zombie racing game now!

No time to describe more! Just get in the car and escape from the chasing of zombies as soon as possible!
Drive your car and be the zombie reaper on road.
